icp.what_they_sell: Commercial construction, renovation, tenant improvements, roofing, site services, and building inspection & maintenance.
icp.customer_industry: Commercial real estate developers, Retail chains expanding locations, Healthcare systems building new facilities, Hospitality companies developing new properties, Industrial companies expanding or renovating facilities, Corporate headquarters relocations or expansions.
ideal_customer_characteristics: Actively developing or expanding their real estate portfolio.
Requires general construction, roofing, or site services.
Values quality, integrity, and client satisfaction.
Has upcoming construction projects with specific deadlines.

serviceable_geography.notes: Completed projects in 10 states, but likely focused on a regional area.

avoid_company_types: Companies with established in-house construction/maintenance teams

prospects.what_they_do: Inland is a vertically integrated commercial real estate investment, finance, and operating group that develops and manages commercial properties.
